TestCase.name: testTwoGroupWindowWithEmitStrategy
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[word, TMP_2 AS sum]) StreamExecGroupWindowAggregate(groupBy=[word], window=[TumblingGroupWindow('w2, 'w_rowtime, 1000.millis)], select=[word, $SUM0(count) AS TMP_2], emit=[early delay 10 millisecond, late no delay]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[word]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[word, TMP_0 AS count, TMP_1 AS w_rowtime]) StreamExecGroupWindowAggregate(groupBy=[word], window=[TumblingGroupWindow('w, 'rowtime, 50.millis)], properties=[TMP_1], select=[word, COUNT(number) AS TMP_0, rowtime('w) AS TMP_1], emit=[early delay 10 millisecond, late no delay]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[word]]) StreamExecDataStreamScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

StreamExecCalc(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecGroupWindowAggregate(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) StreamExecCalc(retract=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) StreamExecGroupWindowAggregate(retract=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecDataStreamScan(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc])
